author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The information in `TFile::Map("extended")` was helpful in investigating https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47750

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1359

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, and in a private test the printout is as expected
title: Add `--map` option to `edmFileUtil`
